com.google.android.exoplayer.smoothstreaming

Class SmoothStreamingManifestFetcher

  • java.lang.Object
      • com.google.android.exoplayer.util.ManifestFetcher<SmoothStreamingManifest>
        • com.google.android.exoplayer.smoothstreaming.SmoothStreamingManifestFetcher

  • public final class SmoothStreamingManifestFetcher
extends ManifestFetcher<SmoothStreamingManifest>
    A concrete implementation of ManifestFetcher for loading SmoothStreaming manifests.

    This class is provided for convenience, however it is expected that most applications will contain their own mechanisms for making asynchronous network requests and parsing the response. In such cases it is recommended that application developers use their existing solution rather than this one.
